projects.title: Glucofit
projects.description: A client project developed using Vue.js and TypeScript, this panel facilitates comprehensive management of doctors, appointments, time slots, healthcare packages, and patient health data ranges.

projects.title: Intellicourse
projects.description: This project, designed for college use, is an AI-powered course generation system. By inputting topics and subtopics, the AI generates a complete syllabus and related questions for each topic. Users can then download the generated syllabus.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: This project is built in the journey of my react tutorial. This is not enough to explain my learning ability but you can get the idea of my learning curve.

projects.title: Securita
projects.description: This is a blockchain based project built using smart contract. It is a decenteralized file sharing system to securely store and share files.
